name: Energy Crisis (andreisaltykov)
description:
!!! Use English Language on Keyboard

!! Press Fullscreen button to get into fullscreen after the game have finished loading

Do not press Fullscreen button during loading!

! Press R to restart level at any time

Prototype build.

Agent Ashe coming to the Space Power Station to figure out why it went offline.

Turns out that the Robots that served at the station decided to use the energy for themselves rather than give it to humans.

What happened? Where that idea came from? How to get the energy back to people?

You need to figure out how to do this!
